item.title: About
item.description: I am Malay Dhamelia /> ⊕ / This section is about me, colophon of the site can be found here . I like cats and brutalist designs. Academically, I am a PhD student at IDC School of Design, IIT Bombay. I study games and play, in in their enterity. Before this academic adventure, I worked at Tata Research Design and Development Centre (TRDDC) as a Researcher Associate at the Behavioural and Business Sciences division.

item.title: Colophon
item.description: Go-Hu-go The website is build using Hugo and Tuftesque. Hugo is a static site generator written in Go. I have used Grav (2017-2019) and WordPress (2013-2017) before switching over to Hugo. Grav being a flat-file CMS, had tremendous build times as I used goDaddy servers to host. The compilation itself took around 30s to 1m. But the major drawbacks were not related to effeciency of compilation, but were functional. One, the pipeline to git was pretty complicated.

item.title: Now
item.description: It makes sense to have a now page. Earlier I used to have disclaimer in the About section of the site stating that the page has slower updates than happenings of life. Unless updates, this page is what I am doing. For the About website, please have a look at the colophon Today is 20th July, 2020. Yesterday marked the completion of four months of staying in. After IITB asked students to evacuate the campus, I returned to my place in Rajkot, Gujarat.

item.title: About This Site
item.description: Hello, I’m an example site that uses the Hugo Morphism theme.
